uniqueRules: Standoff Energy Beam: If any shots with this weapon activate the Destroyer rule, all shots that hit automatically activate that rule too.
name: Savager Laser Barge

uniqueRules:
Plasma Howitzer : 
This weapon counts as Devastator-2 (Vehicle) on any units touched by the Plasma Howitzer’s template that aren’t
directly underneath the centre.
name: Slaughterer Ordnance Barge

uniqueRules:
Flight Mode: When making a Moving action this unit may move 18”, ignoring scenery pieces up to 8” high. Enemy AA weapons
may choose to Reaction Fire against an Obliterator when it does this, counting it as an Aircraft with Armour 10. In
addition, this unit counts as an aircraft for Aerial Advantage deployment purposes.
name: Obliterator Mobile Ordnance

uniqueRules:
The Scourge host may have an Ancient Bond with its Annihilator for +10 points. A unit with an Ancient
Bond gains the Command Centre special rule.

Flight Mode: When making a Moving action this unit may move 18”, ignoring scenery pieces up to 8” high. Enemy AA weapons
may choose to Reaction Fire against an Annihilator when it does this, counting it as an Aircraft with Armour 10. In
addition, this unit counts as an aircraft for Aerial Advantage deployment purposes.
name: Annihilator Mobile Ordnance

uniqueRules: Pheremone Spray : This weapon does D6 hits to all units hit regardless of unit type, including Behemoth's directly targeted. Roll once and apply the roll to all. After resolving hits from this weapon, if the Blast template was used, leave the Blast template on the board. Until the end of the round, the area underneath the template counts as tough scenery. Scenery pieces are unaffected by this rule.
name: Afflictor Hive Walker

uniqueRules: Standoff Energy Cluster : If any shots with this weapon activate the Destroyer rule, all shots that hit automatically activate that rule too.
name: Ravenor Laser Walker

uniqueRules:
Arc Maw : 
If this weapon damages its target, choose another target within 6” of that one. The weapon automatically hits the 
next target, with -1 Energy. Continue doing this until there are no more targets (with -1 Energy for each subsequent 
hit), or the hit fails to damage. Subsequent targets may be Aircraft, but once an Aircraft is chosen, no other 
type of unit may be chosen. Each unit may only be targeted once per shooting attack (different Zones of enemy 
Behemoths count as different targets).

behemothStats.hullEffect: This unit loses the Resilient special rule.
behemothStats.legsEffect:
This unit reduces its Move by 2” and one Seeker Lashes cannot be used 
for the rest of the game.
behemothStats.weaponsEffect: One weapon cannot be used for the rest of the the game.

name: Dictator

uniqueRules:
Bio-Cannon : 
After resolving an attack with this weapon, leave the Area template in place. At the end of the round, any unit 
(friendly or enemy) at least partially under the template gets automatically hit again with the same weapon profile. 
After resolving any hits, remove the template.

behemothStats.hullEffect: This unit loses the Resilient special rule.
behemothStats.legsEffect:
This unit reduces its Move by 2” and one Seeker Lashes cannot be used 
for the rest of the game.
behemothStats.weaponsEffect: One weapon cannot be used for the rest of the the game.

name: Tyrant

uniqueRules: Ion Storm: This weapon hits every non-Aircraft unit within range (friendly and enemy). Each unit gets hit by the weapon profile once, but Infantry not in a Garrison instead get hit D6 times each (roll once for all units). Infantry in a Garrison cannot be hit. This weapon has Accuracy 6+ on any units over 6" away.
name: Desolator Command Barge

uniqueRules: Micro Subjugation Field: Enemy non-behemoth units that activate within 3" of this unit reduce the number of actions they may perform by 1 to a minimum of 1. Additionally enemy infantry may not benefit from Scan Tokens while they (or the Garrison they’re occupying) are within 3" of this unit.
name: Despot Suppression Walker

uniqueRules: Living Weapon: This unit cannot search for or claim Objectives, and cannot embark in transports during battle, though may start the game embarked.
name: Razorworms

uniqueRules: Tough: Re-roll successful Collateral Damage hits against this unit. In addition, this unit may enter a Garrison from any direction, regardless of entrances.
name: Demolisher Shock Troops

uniqueRules: Hive: This unit comes with a free unit of Razorworms that are automatically embarked as if this were a Transport. Any units of Razorworms embarked in the same squad of Slayers count as a single squad.
This unit may replace its Twin Plasma Cannon with an Acid Streamer for no cost.
name: Slayer Heavy Tank

uniqueRules: Subjugation Field: Enemy non-behemoth units that activate within 6" of this unit reduce the number of actions they may perform by 1 to a minimum of 1. Additionally, enemy infantry may not benefit from Scan Tokens while they (or the Garrison they’re occupying) are within 6" of this unit.
name: Subjugator Arthropod

uniqueRules: Tough: Re-roll successful Collateral Damage hits against this unit. In addition, this unit may enter a Garrison from any direction, regardless of entrances.
name: Eviscerator Assault Troops

uniqueRules: Abhorrent: Any enemy Infantry in the same or Linked Garrison suffer a further -1 penalty when searching for objectives, and a +1 penalty to their Fortitude.
Squeeze: When this unit enters a Garrison or starts its activation in a Garrison, it causes D3 Collateral Damage to that Garrison.

Hunting Scream: When a unit is targeted by this weapon, the Screamer doesn't roll damage as normal. Instead, the controlling player rolls a dice for every damage point remaining in the targeted squad and consults their Fortitude. For every roll under the Fortitude value, that squad loses 1 Damage Point with no saves of any kind.
name: Screamer

uniqueRules: Arc Caster: If targeting an Aircraft, this weapon hits on a 2+. If targeting a Scenery Piece, this weapon hits on a 6+.
name: Reaper AA Tank

uniqueRules: Chameleonic Scales: If this unit does not move during its activation and has not disembarked this round, it gains +2 Evasion Countermeasures until the start of its next activation.
This unit may replace its Bio-Mortar for two Plasma Fusillades for +40 points.
name: Eradicator Chameleopod

uniqueRules: Razorworm Pod: During this squad's activation, each unit may launch a Razorworm volley at a Garrison within 6". Roll 1 dice for each unit launching a volley. Rolls of 1 have is no effect. For every roll of 2-4, place 1 unit of Razorworms in that Garrison. For every roll of 5-6 place 2 units of Razorworms in that Garrison. All Razorworm units launched into a Garrison at the same time from the same squad count as being a single squad. That squad is the same Battlegroup as the launching squad and may activate in the same round they are spawned, although do not have to re-roll Damage if Shooting a unit in that Garrison this round. The Garrison receives an equal number of Collateral Damage tokens to units of Razorworms placed.
name: Corruptor Hiveship

uniqueRules: Plasma Generator: Any friendly units with weapons containing the word "Plasma" in their name re-roll failed damage rolls if they are within 9" of this unit when firing. Units with the Fast special rule, Behemoth type, or weapons with a range of CQ are not affected.
name: Overseer Cradle Barge

uniqueRules: Micro Arc Caster: If targeting an Aircraft this weapon hits on a 2+. If targeting a Scenery Piece this weapon hits on a 6+.
name: Minder AA Drone

uniqueRules: Self-Destruct: Only 1 unit in a squad may use this weapon each activation. Place the blast marker over the firing unit, and then follow the normal rules for Area weapons. Remove the firing unit after resolving shooting. This weapon cannot be used if this squad disembarks in the same activation.
name: Emeritus Incendiary Drone

uniqueRules: Speed Boost: If this unit doesn't embark or disembark during its activation, increase its MV by 3" until the end of the activation.
name: Invader APC

uniqueRules: This unit may take Twin Plasma Cannons for +30 pts.
name: Despoiler Heavy Dropship

uniqueRules: Mini Arc Caster: If targeting an Aircraft, this weapon hits on a 2+. If targeting a Scenery Piece, this weapon hits on a 6+.
This unit may take a Mini Arc Caster or Acid Streamer for +15 pts.
name: Harbinger Troopship

uniqueRules: Mini Arc Caster: If targeting an Aircraft or Scenery Piece, this weapon hits on a 2+.
This unit may take a Mini Arc Caster for +15 pts.
name: Harbinger Dropship

uniqueRules: Arc Caster: If targeting an Aircraft, this weapon hits on a 2+. If targeting a Scenery Piece, this weapon hits on a 6+.
This unit may replace its Plasma Cannon with an Arc Caster for +10 points.
name: Corsair Interceptor

uniqueRules: Grasping: This squad must be deployed in a single Transport, although does not count towards that Transport's starting Capacity.
Concentrated Cutting: This unit may not Reaction Fire. Additionally, Cutting Beam's Focus special rule can be used to combine shots from the unit's whole squad.
name: Vampire

uniqueRules: This unit may replace its Plasma Lance with a Photon Blaster for free.
Photon Blaster: This weapon always does damage to targets on a damage roll of 5 or 6.
name: Spectre Skimtank
